derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from French callosité, from Latin callositas, from callosus 'hard-skinned', from callum, callus 'hardened skin'

means.word_mean: 1. an area of skin that is thick or hard from continual pressure or friction (as the sole of the foot)
